attributes.title: Webinar: Decoding the Maya Matrix with Paramahamsa Nithyananda (Part 2)
attributes.description:
Paramahamsa Nithyananda exposes the subtleties of how Maya Matrix traps you into having an opinion, making you believe opinion is knowledge. He explains, “Developing more and more opinions, whether good or bad about the intricacies of life, keeps you inside the matrix, and the feeling this matrix is real”. If you get into the details and don’t form opinions, that is micro management; wisdom is attained.

During Sadashivoham 2016, the Spiritual Alchemy Products that Paramahamsa Nithyananda is creating will give you the extra push out of the Matrix, helping to bolt the highest frequency into you. 
(October 30, 2016)
Get yourself out of the Matrix:
bit.ly/sadashivoham2016
